item.title: Scouter Demo
item.description:
This is a demo for Scouter - a mobile version of “I spy with my little eye”.
How it Works You can read the full spec doc, but the gist of it is: turn based game take a picture of something scan it using machine learning for clues another player takes a picture to guess based on clues get points for guessing right Clues Clues include:
